plugins.name: ralph
plugins.description: RALPH v2 - Single /ralph command for autonomous coding loops with guided planning. Detects state, routes to the right phase.

plugins.name: create-markdown-plan
plugins.description: Create structured Markdown project plans with phases, tasks, ownership, and acceptance criteria

plugins.name: notify-telegram
plugins.description: Send one-way notification messages to yourself via Telegram Bot API

plugins.name: notify-webhook
plugins.description: Send notifications via a PHP relay to Teams, Telegram, Slack, Discord, ntfy, or Email

plugins.name: present-as-html
plugins.description: Generate beautiful, self-contained HTML documents with sidebar navigation, Mermaid diagrams, resizable panels, and fullscreen zoom from any analysis or report content

plugins.name: hevy-api
plugins.description: Interact with the Hevy workout platform API via curl/bash. Covers auth setup, workouts, exercises, routines, and pagination.
